testing-your-api-with-phpunit.title: Testing your API with PHPUnit
testing-your-api-with-phpunit.description: How to test your RESTful API with PHPUnit and Guzzle and avoid regressions when developing your API.

setup-local-web-server-apache-php-osx-yo.title: Setup local web server with Apache and PHP on OS X Yosemite
setup-local-web-server-apache-php-osx-yo.description: How to setup a local web server on OS X Yosemite with Apache and PHP and link projects directly from Dropbox to Apache.

download-and-edit-json-files-with-gulp.title: Download and edit JSON files with gulp
download-and-edit-json-files-with-gulp.description: How to download JSON files, e.g. from REST services, and edit/format/manipulate them with gulp.

using-browser-sync-with-harp.title: Using BrowserSync with Harp
using-browser-sync-with-harp.description: Automatically refresh your browser when you update content or styles in Harp using BrowserSync.

showing-photo-gps-location-on-google-map.title: Showing photo GPS location on Google Maps with gulp
showing-photo-gps-location-on-google-map.description: How to read the GPS data from photo EXIF data using gulp, and mark the coordinates on Google Maps.

breadcrumb-trail-harp-jade.title: Breadcrumb trail with Harp and Jade
breadcrumb-trail-harp-jade.description: How to create a microdata breadcrumb trail with Harp and Jade using the current page navigation path.

add-custom-hostname-to-apache-osx-maveri.title: Add custom hostname to Apache on OSX 10.9 Mavericks
add-custom-hostname-to-apache-osx-maveri.description: How to use a custom hostname/domain with your local Apache web server on OSX Mavericks using Virtual Hosts and Dropbox.

syntax-highlight-files-macos-terminal-le.title: Syntax highlight files in MacOS Terminal with less
syntax-highlight-files-macos-terminal-le.description: Display files in Terminal using less and GNU source-highlight. Install with Homebrew and setup with only three lines in .bash_profile.

setup-local-web-server-apache-php-macos-.title: Setup local web server with Apache and PHP on MacOS X Mavericks
setup-local-web-server-apache-php-macos-.description: How to setup a local web server on MacOS X Mavericks with Apache and PHP and link projects directly from Dropbox to Apache.

navigate-form-fields-with-arrow-keys.title: Navigate form fields with arrow keys
navigate-form-fields-with-arrow-keys.description: A simple jQuery plugin to navigate form fields using the arrow keys, code freely available on GitHub.

split-string-to-table-using-transact-sql.title: Split a string to a table using T-SQL
split-string-to-table-using-transact-sql.description: Split a delimited string (e.g. comma-separated) to a table using Transact-SQL using a table-valued function and common table expressions.

serialize-object-into-a-query-string-wit.title: Serialize object into a query string with Reflection
serialize-object-into-a-query-string-wit.description: Serialize any object in C# to a query string with the .ToQueryString() extension method. Supports primitives, strings, arrays and collections.

calculate-a-running-total-in-sql-server-.title: Calculate a running total in SQL Server 2012
calculate-a-running-total-in-sql-server-.description: How to calculate a running total in SQL Server 2012 with alternative solution for SQL Server 2005 and 2008 using Common Table Expressions.

bind-a-model-property-to-a-different-nam.title: Bind a model property to a different named query string field
bind-a-model-property-to-a-different-nam.description: How to bind a model property to a different named query string field with a custom alias attribute and model binder in MVC3.

grouping-data-with-linq-and-mvc.title: Grouping data with LINQ and MVC
grouping-data-with-linq-and-mvc.description: Show a list or table of data grouped by category or group header using LINQ with a reusable generic class.

mapping-relational-table-data-to-a-tree-.title: Mapping relational table data to a tree structure in MVC
mapping-relational-table-data-to-a-tree-.description: How to map SQL table data into a tree structure and display it as a nested list using recursive Razor display templates.

localization-with-fallback-using-linq.title: Localization with fallback using LINQ
localization-with-fallback-using-linq.description: How to get localization in MVC with fallback using a single LINQ statement, translated texts will be selected if available or fallback to a default.

firefox-auto-login-with-windows-authenti.title: Firefox auto login with Windows Authentication and AD
firefox-auto-login-with-windows-authenti.description: Get Firefox to login automatically on your intranet websites with Windows Authentication and Active Directory with a simple change in about:config.

view-source-on-the-ipad-and-iphone.title: View source on the iPad and iPhone
view-source-on-the-ipad-and-iphone.description: View source on the iPad using a bookmarklet to see the source code with syntax highlighting, selectable text and clickable links for URIs.

gmail-plus-your-email-to-filter-maillist.title: Gmail+ your email – filter maillists and catch spam
gmail-plus-your-email-to-filter-maillist.description: Filter your Gmail by creating unique email addresses for each service you subscribe to by suffixing your username with a + and any text.

custom-membershipprovider-principal-and-.title: Custom MembershipProvider, Principal and Identity
custom-membershipprovider-principal-and-.description: Implementing a custom MembershipProvider, IPrincipal and IIdentity. How to cache the objects accross page requests and access the objects through a wrapper.

using-uri-hash-instead-of-query-strings.title: Using URI hash instead of query strings
using-uri-hash-instead-of-query-strings.description: Using URI location hash instead of query strings for bookmarkable JavaScript/AJAX pages with dynamic content.

index.title: Blog
index.description: Ole Bjørn Michelsen is a programmer, speaker and photo hobbyist. I've been coding for a score of years and blogging on programming all the while.
